00019 
00020 #ifndef __surfit_solver_ssor__
00021 #define __surfit_solver_ssor__
00022 
00023 #include <algorithm>
00024 #include <vector>
00025 
00026 #include <errno.h>
00027 
00028 #include "vec.h"
00029 #include "vec_alg.h"
00030 
00031 #include <float.h>
00032 
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 namespace surfit {
00036 
00037 template <class M, class V>
00038 vec * ssor(M * A, V * b, int max_it, REAL tol, vec *& X, REAL omega = REAL(1.6), REAL undef_value = FLT_MAX) {
00039 
00040         int flag = 0;                                // initialization
00041         int iter = 0;
00042         
00043         REAL bnrm2 = norm2( b );
00044         if  ( bnrm2 == REAL(0) )
00045                 bnrm2 = REAL(1); 
00046 
00047         vec * r = new vec(b->size());
00048         
00049         vec * x = NULL;
00050         if (!X) {
00051                 x = new vec(b->size());
00052                 int cnt;
00053                 for (cnt = 0; cnt < b->size(); cnt++) {
00054                         (*x)(cnt) = (*b)(cnt);
00055                 };
00056         }
00057         else 
00058         {
00059                 x = X;
00060                 X = NULL;
00061         }
00062 
00063         REAL error = FLT_MAX;
00064         REAL error_norm = bnrm2;        
00065         REAL sigma = 0;
00066         int i,j,prev_j;
00067 
00068         int n = b->size();
00069         REAL a_ii;
00070 
00071         vec * x_1 = new vec(*x);
00072         vec * x_12 = new vec(*x);
00073 
00074         for (iter = 0; iter < max_it; iter++) {
00075 
00076                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00077                         
00078                         a_ii = A->at(i,i);
00079                         if (a_ii == REAL(0)) 
00080                                 continue;
00081 
00082                         sigma = 0;
00083                         
00084                         for (j = 0; j < i;) {
00085                                 prev_j = j;
00086                                 sigma += (*x_12)(prev_j)*A->at(i,j,&j);
00087                         }
00088                         
00089                         for (j = i+1; j < n;) {
00090                                 prev_j = j;
00091                                 sigma += (*x_1)(prev_j)*A->at(i,j,&j);
00092                         }
00093                         
00094                         sigma = ( (*b)(i) - sigma )/a_ii;
00095                         
00096                         (*x_12)(i) = (*x_1)(i) + omega*( sigma - (*x_1)(i) );
00097 
00098                 }
00099 
00100 
00101                 for (i = n-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00102 
00103                         a_ii = A->at(i,i);
00104                         if (a_ii == REAL(0)) 
00105                                 continue;
00106                         
00107                         sigma = 0;
00108                         
00109                         for (j = 0; j < i;) {
00110                                 prev_j = j;
00111                                 sigma += (*x_12)(prev_j)*A->at(i,j,&j);
00112                         }
00113                         
00114                         for (j = i+1; j < n;) {
00115                                 prev_j = j;
00116                                 sigma += (*x)(prev_j)*A->at(i,j,&j);
00117                         }
00118                                         
00119                         sigma = ( (*b)(i) - sigma )/a_ii;
00120                         (*x)(i) = (*x_12)(i) + omega*( sigma - (*x_12)(i) );
00121 
00122                 }
00123 
00124                 
00125                 error = 0;
00126                 for (i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00127                         error += ((*x)(i) - (*x_1)(i))*((*x)(i) - (*x_1)(i));
00128                 }
00129                 error /= error_norm;
00130                 if (error < tol)
00131                         break;
00132                 
00133                 *x_1 = *x;
00134 
00135         }
00136 
00137         delete x_1;
00138         delete x_12;
00139 
00140         writelog(SURFIT_MESSAGE,"ssor: (%d)\terror : %12.6G iter : %d",x->size(), error, iter);
00141 
00142         return x;
00143         
00144 };
00145 
00146 }; // namespace surfit;
00147 
00148 #endif 
00149
